response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. I trust this price reflects the exceptional quality and potential return on investment that comes with our product. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 7200}
